Reason: The 'commitlog_sync' configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts the system's performance and durability of data. Depending on the type of CommitLog service selected (periodic, batch, or group), the frequency of syncing the CommitLog and acknowledging writes varies, leading to notable performance variations at the system level. The configuration-related code instantiates different CommitLog service executors based on the 'commitlog_sync' value, indicating that the choice of CommitLog service type can have a substantial impact on execution time and memory consumption.
